current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Radiation Exposure Compensation Act to
		  improve compensation for workers involved in uranium mining, and for other
		  purposes.

shall establish a grant program relating to the epidemiological
			 impacts of uranium mining and milling. Grants awarded under the program shall

			 milling among non-occupationally exposed individuals, including family members
			 of uranium miners and millers.
